attributes.action: MAKE JUNE 6th - THE D-DAY - A BRITISH NATIONAL HOLIDAY
attributes.additional_details: Cartoonist & Illustrator from the south coast of England, and someone who realises just how lucky we have all been...thanks to the sacrifices made by so many, in Normandy on June 6th 1944!
attributes.background: In order for the significance of D-Day not to be lost to future generations. A holiday would be a welcome reminder, and a time for commemoration.
